definition: Cachexia (physical wasting associated with long-term illness)

sentences.english: Effects of Kanglaite on cachexia and immune function of the patients with advanced cancer.
sentences.chinese: 康萊特對晚期惡性腫瘤患者惡病質和免疫功能的影響。

sentences.english: The mechanism of PingFei Mixture treating cachexia is complex.
sentences.chinese: 平肺口服液治療肺癌惡病質是通過多途徑發揮作用的。

sentences.english: However, he developed progressive cachexia , withdrew from hemodialysis and subsequently died.
sentences.chinese: 然而他發展成惡病質，停止血液透析，結果死亡。

sentences.english: To analyze the relationship between ZAG and gastrointestinal cancer cachexia.
sentences.chinese: 分析ZAG與胃腸癌及其引起的惡病質狀況的相關性。

sentences.english: Clinical study on the treatment of tumor cachexia with composite Shougong Powder.
sentences.chinese: 複方守宮散治療腫瘤惡病質的臨牀研究。

sentences.english: Clinical study on anticancer cachexia of Shenfu Injection.
sentences.chinese: 參附註射液抗癌症惡病質的臨牀研究。

sentences.english: In the current guidelines this latter definition of cachexia has been adopted.
sentences.chinese: 在這種惡病質後者的定義已經通過目前的指導方針。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the association between tumor necrosis factor and cachexia.
sentences.chinese: 目的初步探討腫瘤壞死因子含量與癌症惡病質的關係。
